title: Dizziness and Vertigo: A Simple Guide to Figuring It Out
description: "Don't you understand, Doc, I'm just dizzy!"As a "dizzy doctor," a specialist who accepted referrals of dizzy patients from other doctors, ear surgeon Dr. William Wright became the "go to" resource for patients with difficult balance problems.He found that patients could often tell him the diagnosis if he just asked the right questions. Here he distills 30 years of experience into a simple guide for the non-medical person suffering from dizziness.
author: William  Wright
